      boolean checkIfBlocked​(com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2 pos, com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2 move)

      void findCollidingRobot​(com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2 pos, com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2 move)
      Called from checkIfBlocked(com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2, com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2) if the robot collides with another robot.
      boolean robotNextToRobot​(com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2 pos, com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2 move)
      Called from checkIfBlocked(com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2, com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2) if there is multiple robots in a line in the direction the robot is moving.

    • Method Detail

      • robotNextToRobot

        public boolean robotNextToRobot​(com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2 pos,
                                com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2 move)
        Called from checkIfBlocked(com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2, com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2) if there is multiple robots in a line in the direction the robot is moving. Iterates through all the robots to see if the foremost robot in the direction is blocked, moves robots accordingly.
        Parameters:
        pos - GridPoint2 position of the robot.
        move - GridPoint2 with steps in x and y direction.
        Returns:
        True if there is a wall blocking the path.

      • findCollidingRobot

        public void findCollidingRobot​(com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2 pos,
                               com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2 move)
        Called from checkIfBlocked(com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2, com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2) if the robot collides with another robot. Moves the robots accordingly.
        Parameters:
        pos - GridPoint2 position of the robot.
        move - GridPoint2 with steps in x and y direction.

      • checkIfBlocked

        public boolean checkIfBlocked​(com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2 pos,
                              com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2 move)
        Checks if the robot is blocked by another robot, true if that robot is blocked by a wall. If not, inspects further with robotNextToRobot(com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2, com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2) and collides with findCollidingRobot(com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2, com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2)
        Parameters:
        pos - GridPoint2 position of the robot.
        move - GridPoint2 with steps in x and y direction.
        Returns:
        True if the robot or any of the robots in front of it is found in robotNextToRobot(com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2, com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2) is blocked.
